name: Mixed Dots
description:
Welcome to Mixed Dots :D

It's a little puzzle game where you have to... well, connect dots.

Draw lines!

Connect dots!

Mix 2 colours to create a new colour!

 

Plz read the guide first (except for the solutions inside of it ;)

Screen resolution: 1920 x 1080

Music used: Aztec Jungle by Brandon Fiechter
